title.narrative: Promoting the Adaptation and Adoption of RECP (Resource Efficient and Cleaner Production) through the Establishment and Operation of a Cleaner Production Centre (CPC) in Ukraine

description.narrative: The present project aims at enhancing the resource productivity, competitiveness and environmental performance of industry in Ukraine. It will support the adaptation and adoption of Resource Efficient and Cleaner Production methods, practices, technologies and policies, providing national industries with the necessary tools to facilitate access to national and regional markets with environmentally sound products and improve the ability of national enterprises to successfully negotiate their position in the global market. The present project has been developed on the basis of the experience that UNIDO and UNEP have gained in establishing Cleaner Production Centres and Programmes in nearly 50 countries worldwide. It builds on the results and lessons learned during the implementation of the UNIDO project for establishing a National Cleaner Production Programme in Ukraine which has been ongoing since 2007. In addition, UNIDO organized an international expert mission to Ukraine at the end of 2009 and two national stakeholder consultation workshops in June and December 2010 which brought together the main ministries, institutions and donors involved in CP-related activities in Ukraine. the outcomes of the above-stated preparatory work and UNIDO#s global expertise enable the definition of the specific requirements fo
